Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>、おれたちを召し使い呼ばわり するなんて、ひどいじゃねーかよ？
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>, how could you go and call us your servants? Wasn't that pretty mean of you?

Entry.JapaneseText: すまん……とっさに思いついた事を言っただけだ。 以前、ミナールで<Mao>に言われていたからな。
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry... I just said what had come to mind. <Mao> said the same about me in Minal once.
He did? What was that about?

Entry.JapaneseText: あの時のコト、まだ覚えてたの!? <Eugene>って、案外、根に持つタイプなんだね。
Entry.EnglishText: You still remember that?! I never took you as the type to hold a grudge.

Entry.JapaneseText: 記憶力がいいと言ってくれ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'd rather you refer to it as having a good memory...
